parameters.query:
SELECT t.id as trending_id, ir.id as ip_id, COALESCE(ir."titleEnglish", ir."titleOriginal") as search_keyword, t."googleTrend" as current_value
FROM trendings t
INNER JOIN ip_reviews ir ON ir.id = t."ipId"
WHERE ir.status IN ('PENDING', 'APPROVED')
  AND COALESCE(ir."titleEnglish", ir."titleOriginal") IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY ir."totalScore" DESC
LIMIT 100

=-- 1. 写入 TrendingHistory 记录
INSERT INTO trending_history (id, "trendingId", source, value, "rawValue", metadata, "recordedAt")
VALUES (
  gen_random_uuid(),
  '{{ $json.trendingId }}',
  'GOOGLE_TRENDS',
  {{ $json.normalizedValue }},
  {{ $json.googleTrend }},
  '{{ JSON.stringify($json.metadata).replace(/'/g, "''") }}'::jsonb,
  NOW()
);

-- 2. 更新 Trending 表的热度值和变化率
UPDATE trendings
SET
  "googleTrend" = {{ $json.googleTrend }},
  "googleTrendChange" = {{ $json.googleTrendChange !== null ? $json.googleTrendChange : 'NULL' }},
  "updatedAt" = NOW()
WHERE id = '{{ $json.trendingId }}';
